text: Ian Puleston-Davies (born 6 September 1958) is a Welsh actor. He is best known for portraying the roles of Terry Williams in the Channel 4 soap opera Hollyoaks (1995–1996), Owen Armstrong in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street (2010–2015), and Charlie Fisher in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2010). ==Other websites== * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Welsh television actors Category:Welsh stage actors Category:Welsh voice actors Category:People from Flintshire
title: Ian Puleston-Davies
